author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Protection to avoid unphysical ZDC SimHits which caused crashes during digitization (backport #46286)

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of #46286
title: Run3-hcx370 Protection to avoid unphysical ZDC SimHits which caused crashes during digitization (backport #46286)
